amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities, Counties, And Other Political Subdivisions
amendatorysection.catchline: Grants of assistance; purposes; applications; evaluation.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The department shall use the fund to provide grants of assistance for the following purposes:
(a) To assist in the construction of new civic centers and recreation centers or the renovation or expansion of existing civic centers and recreation centers;
(b) To assist in the conversion, rehabilitation, or reuse of historic buildings or districts;

(c) To assist in the preservation and restoration of historic buildings owned by a nonprofit organization if a contractual relationship is created between a municipality and the nonprofit organization; or
(d) To upgrade community centers, including the demolition of substandard and abandoned buildings.
(2) Applications for grants of assistance pursuant to this section shall be evaluated by the department pursuant to section 13-2707.
